projects.bodyText:
- Design Your Own Courses Instantly

projects.title: LLMs For All
projects.bodyText:
Custom chat bot creator released to all Microsoft Employees. Existed before Microsoft Studio Copilot was released as our external product
 - Led initial hackathon project, the built out with team
 - Ongoing support for teams using product

projects.title: Quiet Hours App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that **automatically silences** your phone during class hours, designed for **VITians**.
 - Option to select class **slots** and **custom time**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.

projects.title: Secure Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to send texts in real time.
 - End to End encryption using **RSA** Algorithm.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - Secured with **Fingerprint** lock.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
